overview:
Sidhant is a freelancer, technical consultant, blogger and writer. His areas of interest basically revolve around product reviews, gadgets, SEO ,wordpress and computing. He has also written guest posts at many popular technology blogs like Callingallgeeks.org . He is currently pursuing his Bachelor of Technology from The Institute Of Technology And Management . Apart from blogging, Sidhant also specializes in Thesis customization, C/C++ programming.

Sidhant has completed his Higher Secondary Education from Bal Bharati Public School . When not blogging or customizing, Sidhant studies Electronics and Communications and Information Technology .

You can contact him for reviews, suggestions or any other feedback via the Contact form or you can also mail him at admin[at]geeksyrup[dot]com .

Sidhant has had a history of blogging, where he first started his blog on a free blogging platform â€“ Blogger by the name â€“ â€ Hackstormâ€ (2007-2008) which had to shut down due to some reasons. After Hackstorm, Sidhant started another web-blog on Blogger by the name of MyPowerplace (2008-2011) which was well appreciated by the readers. GeekSyrup was then later found in 2011. Recently, he is working as the C.E.O of Gadgec (2012) which is another technology journal read by millions.
